name: Creamy White Chicken Chili
recipeIngredient: 1 lb chicken breast, cooked and shredded
2 cans (15 oz) great northern beans, drained
recipeInstructions: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion until translucent; add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Stir in chicken, beans, broth, chiles, and spices; simmer 15 minutes.
Off heat, stir in sour cream and cheese until melted.
Finish with lime juice; garnish with cilantro and serve.
